descriptor.name: Ace XL 11 Kg 5 Star Semi Automatic Washing Machine - Graphite Grey
descriptor.short_desc:
* Wash upto 10 king size bedsheets at one go
 
 * Removes upto 10 tough stains
 
 * 3D Turbo Impeller
 
 * 3D Lint Filter
 
 * Hard Water Wash
 
 * 5 wash programs
 
 * 3D LINT FILTER - 3D Lint filter with unique triple layered filtration process allows effective collection of lint so that clothes come out clean & fresh after every wash.
 
 * 3D TURBO IMPELLER - 3D Turbo Impeller with rotary stem & 3D scrub pads provides perfect triple motion for clothes to remove dirt effectively.
 
 * 1400 RPM SPIN MOTOR - High RPM speed spin motor ensures superior & faster drying of even a heavy load of laundry.
 
 * WATERPROOF & SHOCKPROOF CONTROL PANEL - Now keep your machine anywhere you feel like without worrying about water spillage on the control panel damaging your machine.
 
 * 10 YEAR WARRANTY - Get complete peace of mind with 10 years warranty on Wash Motor + Prime Mover & 5 years warranty on Spin Moto.
 
 * IF DESIGN AWARD - Winner of coveted iF Design Award 2019, one of the world's foremost design competitions.
 
 * REMOVE 40 TOUGH STAINS* - Powered by 3D Scrub technology it removes tough stains with ease.
 
 * WASHES UP TO 10 KING SIZE BED SHEETS - With the cutting edge 3D Scrub Technology, now you can wash multiple loads of laundry at once.
 
 * 5 WASH PROGRAMS - The machine has 5 different wash programs(Delicate, Normal, Gentle, Stain wash & Anti Bacterial Wash) ensuring a safe and customized wash for every fabric type. You can choose these modes/wash programs according to your wash needs.
 
 * LARGE WHEEL - Fitted with a big wheels so that you can easily move the machine around making it more robust and stable.
 
 * HARD WATER WASH - Unique hard water wash program that gives better dirt and stain removal even in hard water conditions.
 
 * IN THE BOX CONTENTS - 1 unit washing machine, 1 unit spin cap, 1 unit drain pipe, 1 unit user manual
 
 * WARRANTY - 2 Years Comprehensive & 10 years warranty on Wash Motor + Prime Mover & 5 years warranty on Spin Motor
 
 * CONTACT US - Email: wstore@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 *FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 *REPLACEMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brandâ€™s replacment policy.
descriptor.long_desc:
UP TO 2X FRESHNESS - with 6TH SENSE ActiveFresh TECHNOLOGY Protton world series powered by 6TH SENSE ActiveFresh Technology ensures up to 2X freshness to your fruits and vegetables - by preventing excessive ripening, maintaining their natural moisture and preventing 99% bacterial growth.
 
  3 DOOR ADVANTAGE - Protton's unique 3 door format offers benefits that no other refrigerator in its class has. It provides the largest 32 L fruits and vegetables storage space, prevents odour mixing and ensures better cooling@ retention owing to 3 separate zones for different storage needs. In separate compartment for fruits and vegetables. @When compared to a conventional double-door refrigerator.
 
  INDIA'S FIRST ACTIVE FRESH ZONE - The refrigerator's unique 3 door format gives you an exclusive bottom drawer the Active Fresh Zone for fruits and vegetables. This prevents odour mixing keeping fruits and vegetables fresher for a longer duration.
 
  ZEOLITE TECHNOLOGY - Zeolite Technology prevents excessive ripening of fruits and vegetables by absorbing ethylene emission from them. This reduces the sugar content of fruits and vegetables thereby keeping fruits and vegetables fresher for longer.
 
  MOISTURE RETENTION TECHNOLOGY - In ordinary refrigerators, the cold air comes directly in contact with fruits and vegetables and robs them of their intrinsic moisture. But in Protton world series refrigerator, the cold air flows around the compartment, keeping its contents cool while retaining their moisture and natural freshness.
 
  MICROBLOCK TECHNOLOGY - Microblock Technology-Adapts to varying internal conditions to prevent up to 99% bacterial growth, keeping fruits and vegetables fresh for longer.
 
  CUSTOMIZED COOLING TECHNOLOGY - The All new Protton comes with a customizable temperature knob for delicacies like cheese berries, chocolate and other dairy products.
 
  ENERGY EFFICIENT - As unbelievable as it is, the all new Protton world series consumes lesser energy than a CFL, making it one of the most energy efficient refrigerator in its class. T&C Apply. As compared to a 60 watt CFL.
 
  ICE TWISTER - Dispensed and collect ice cubes conveniently inside the collector box with easy twist action.
 
  AIR BOOSTER - Controls the circulation of cold air so that each compartment receives uniform cooling that it requires.
 
  32L LARGE STORAGE - This refrigerator's Active Fresh Zone for fruits and vegetables provides upto 32L of large storage space. In separate compartments for fruits and vegetables. Available in select models.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - Refrigerator, User Manual
 
  WARRANTY - 1 Year Comprehensive & 10 Years Compressor
 
  CONTACT US - Email: helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 REPLACMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brandâ€™s replacment policy.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: WHIRLPOOL OF INDIA LTD, PLOT NO. 40, SECTOR-44, GURUGRAM, HARYANA-122002

descriptor.name: Ace Supreme 7.5 Kg 5 Star Semi Automatic Washing Machine - Grey Dazzle
descriptor.short_desc:
Sort-StackCarry station
 Multi Utility Tray
 In built Scrubber
 Max Dry Mode
 420W motor
 Rat Protection
 4 wheels for easy maneuvering
descriptor.long_desc:
25 MINS SOAK TIME - Easy removal of tough dirt with continuous soaking and scrubbing action for 25 minutes.
 
  SOAK TECHNOLOGY - Soaking laundry in concentrated detergent solution helps loosen dirt which makes it easier to remove the stains and dirt from the clothes during wash cycle.
 
  IN BUILT COLLAR SCRUBBER - The In-built Collar Scrubber which ensures that the collars get a good scrubbing every time.
 
  3 WASH PROGRAMS - DELICATE NORMAL HEAVY - The machine has 3 different wash programs(Delicate, normal, heavy ) ensuring a safe and customized wash for every fabric type.
 
  MAX DRY - The machine is equipped with a dry timer that gives superior drying results.
 
  RUST PROOF BODY - Washing Machines are built to last long and have a plastic body which is non-corrosive and rust proof.
 
  4 WHEELS - Fitted with a big wheels so that you can easily move the machine around making it more robust and stable.
 
  EASY MOBILITY - Equipped with 4 wheels, the machine can be moved around by sliding it with ease.
 
  SPIN SHOWER - Spin Shower Facility in washing machine helps reduce detergent residue and soap particles from the clothes.
 
  END OF CYCLE BUZZER - This washing machine is equipped with an end of cycle buzzer to inform the user about the wash cycle completion. This feature helps a user to prevent leaving the wet clothes in the washing machine which cause smell in your laundry.
 
  MEMORY RETENTION - In case of power cut-off, the wash cycle resumes from where it was stopped.
 
  5 YEARS WARRANTY - Get complete peace of mind with 5 year warranty on the wash motor and the prime mover of this washing machine.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - 1 unit washing machine, 1 unit spin cap, 1 unit drain pipe, 1 unit user manual
 
  WARRANTY - 4 Years on Comprehensive & 5 years on Motor
 
  CONTACT US - Email: helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 REPLACMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brandâ€™s replacment policy.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: WHIRLPOOL OF INDIA LTD, PLOT NO. 40, SECTOR-44, GURUGRAM, HARYANA-122002

descriptor.name: 360Â° Bloomwash Pro 9.5 kg 5 Star Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine with In-Built Heater - Graphite
descriptor.short_desc:
Removes Up to 50 Tough Stains and Up to 48 hours Old Stains
 Removes Up to 99% Germs & Allergens 
 360 Bloomwash Technology
 Hot Catalytic Soak
 Hard Water Wash
descriptor.long_desc:
5 STAR - Whirlpool Washing Machines come with 5 Star Energy rating for best in class water & energy efficiency.
 
  REMOVES UP TO 50 TOUGH STAINS - Get rid of everyday stains with the all-new Hotmatic Technology. It's advanced microprocessor and intellisensor enables the washing machine to analyze data and control water temperature for different fabric type.
 
  3 HOT WATER MODES - Heats water up to 60Â° C at 3 different levels ranging from Warm, Hot to Allergen Free, offering customized care by offering different water temperatures as per cloth type.
 
  REMOVES UP TO 48 HOURS OLD STAINS - No need to worry about immediate removal of stains. With the Stainwash program, one can remove stains that are even 48 hours old.
 
  HOT CATALYTIC SOAK - The hot catalytic soak mechanism soaks clothes in concentrated detergent water to loosen the dirt, before the agitation. This mechanism uses 1/3rd the quantity of water to create a high detergent concentration.
 
  HARD WATER WASH - Adapts the wash cycle to give you 20% better cleaning. The intelligent hard water mechanism adapts the machine program for washing in hard water, giving improved washing performance.
 
  EDGE TO EDGE DESIGN - 360Â° Bloomwash Pro has a wide edge to edge, one piece glass lid which gives a better and more convenient drum access.
 
  HEXA BLOOM IMPELLER - The newly designed hexa bloom impeller with 6 vanes, washes clothes in a unique 360Â° blooming wash motion. This makes clothes rub against each other ensuring superior cleaning results with minimizing fabric abrasion.
 
  DYNAMIX - Senses the laundry load inside the tub and recommends detergent dosage accordingly.
 
  ZPF TECHNOLOGY - To resolve water pressure situations, Whirlpool presents ZPF Technology. Zero Pressure. Fill technology ensures that the wash tub gets filled 50%^^ faster even if the water pressure is as low as 17mpa.
 
  SOFT CLOSE LID - The hydraulic mechanism of the soft closing lid gives you a premium experience and also protects the glass lid from any damage.
 
  POWER DRY - The Power Dry feature has 4 unique drying options â€“ Gentle, Normal, Extra and Power. It provides 4 customised drying options as per the fabric type and its drying requirements.
 
  IN THE BOX CONTENTS - Washing Machine, Inlet Pipe, Detergent Cup, Rat Mesh, Drain Pipe, Drain Hose with Clamp 
 
  WARRANTY - 3 Years Comprehensive & 10 Years Warranty on Prime Mover & Motor
 
  CONTACT US - Email: helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com | Toll Free: 1800 208 1800
 
 FREE DELIVERY AND EXPRESS INSTALLATION
 
 REPLACMENT POLICY - Any request for replacement of a Product that was damaged at the time of Delivery should be made within 5 days of Delivery. Product will be replaced by the Seller as per Brandâ€™s replacment policy.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: WHIRLPOOL OF INDIA LTD, PLOT NO. 40, SECTOR-44, GURUGRAM, HARYANA-122002
